body.name: ZINUS Lorelai 14 Inch Metal Platform Bed Frame, Mattress Foundation with Steel Slat Support, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, Full
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 24 mins
features: GO MINIMALIST - Less is more, especially with this modern and structurally sound foundation that lends both strength and understated sophistication to your bedroom - two qualities that never go out of style
UNDERBED CLEARANCE - A 14 inch platform features 13 inches of underbed space perfect for storing extra odds and ends
NO BOX SPRING NEEDED - Reliable metal slats are designed to support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring
EASY ASSEMBLY - All parts, tools and instructions are shipped straight to your door in one efficiently packed box for simple set-up that takes less than hour with a friend’s help
Mattress sold separately; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 350 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 700 lbs
body.description: We’ve taken the hard work out of looking good by creating the Lorelai Metal Platform Bed; a strong and clean-lined frame that seamlessly blends with the style of just about any room. Crafted with a modern, minimalist silhouette, the Lorelai doesn’t skimp on stability. A thick steel frame with a metal platform firmly supports any latex, spring or memory foam mattress without the added expense of a box spring. And did we also mention the 13 inches of underbed space, perfect for stashing you extra storage bins and boxes? After it’s delivered straight to your door accompanied by a 5-year warranty and everything you need to assemble it, the under an hour that it takes to put together this outstanding foundation is well worth it. Judging by its thousands of happy customer reviews, welcoming home this affordable frame should be no problem at all.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sturdy & Functional Bed Frames Style You Desire With The Support Your Mattress Deserves Zinus metal bed frames are built to do more than just support your favorite mattress while you sleep at night. Each style is carefully planned and manufactured to function efficiently while appealing to a sleek, minimalist design aesthetic that perfectly ties in with any decor style.

Strong. Simple. Reliable. Quick, Easy Assembly As much as we love puzzles, we don’t enjoy tedious & confusing assembly instructions. So, we engineer each bed frame to come together with ease and include simple instructions to accompany it so you can spend more time enjoying the big picture (or snoozing - we don’t judge). No Box Spring Needed Metal bed frames may not be the answer to world peace but they certainly account for peace of mind and a good night’s rest. They’re designed to support your mattress while you sleep, without needing a box spring.

Compare Zinus Metal Platform Beds Zinus Lorelei Zinus Joseph Zinus Abel Material Steel Material Steel & Wood Slats Material Steel Color Black Color Black Color Black Heights Available 14" Heights Available 18",14",10" and 6" Heights Available 14"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars inus Lorelai Platform Twin Bedframe: A Sturdy, Space-Saving Marvel
reviews.reviewText: The Zinus Lorelai Platform Twin Bedframe has turned out to be a delightful addition to our home. This bedframe ticks all the right boxes, offering a hassle-free assembly, exceptional sturdiness, and the perfect height for underbed storage while keeping our children comfortable and safe. Here's why we're absolutely thrilled with it:**Effortless Assembly (5/5):** The assembly process for this bedframe was an absolute breeze. The provided instructions were clear and concise, making it easy for us to put it together without any hiccups. In no time, we had a fully functional bedframe ready for use, which was a pleasant surprise.**Exceptional Sturdiness (5/5):** The sturdiness of the Zinus Lorelai bedframe is truly commendable. It feels solid and well-built, with no wobbling or creaking. We have complete confidence that our children are safe while sleeping or playing on it, which is of utmost importance.**Ideal Underbed Storage (5/5):** The bedframe's perfect height allows us to utilize the underbed space for storage without sacrificing the kids' comfort. It's a fantastic solution for decluttering the room and keeping their toys and belongings organized yet easily accessible.**Child-Friendly Design (5/5):** We appreciate the thoughtful design of this bedframe, which caters to the needs of our children. The height is just right for them to climb in and out of bed independently, promoting their growing sense of autonomy.**Versatile Aesthetics (5/5):** The clean and simple design of the Zinus Lorelai bedframe seamlessly blends with various room aesthetics. It complements a range of decor styles, making it a versatile addition to any bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go for it
reviews.reviewText: Easy set up, all the parts were there. Very sturdy, awesome product. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and price
reviews.reviewText: Received product as described. Instructions were a bit confusing at first but it was very simple to piece together. Comes with a small ratchet that makes installation a breeze. Very sturdy and does not make any creaking noises. It was a little difficult putting the mattress on top due to the non slip, but stays in place excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and pretty easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This frame is very sturdy, I’ve been using it for a couple weeks now and it’s perfectly fine. Sometimes I jump to sit on the bed and it doesn’t shift at all and it doesn’t make any sound either. Assembling it is pretty straight forward, I would highly recommend getting someone to help you. I assembled this by myself and my goodness, it was a little difficult at times. And there were some bolts that would just not screw in and I had to use a lot of force. The ratchet that comes with it is a nice tool! If you’re looking for a bed frame that’s on the less expensive side, I would recommend this one. Whenever you move it will also break down very compactly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Requires some adjustments. Super easy set up, very sturdy, love the simplicity
reviews.reviewText: We like it. We kept our box springs and are using them still, so bed sets up pretty high. Took a couple nights to get used to that. We like it. Only problem is the box springs slide a little, easy adjustment back. There are adhesive tapes on the frame, but we didn’t peel them because we are planning on buying new mattresses from the local Amish mattress shop. Hopefully the adhesive tape will work on them. Otherwise no problem.No head board means pillows fall off, but not a big deal. Extra room under the bed a plus. Can see dust quicker lol, sweeper doesn’t fit perfectly, still need to use attachments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great simple mattress frame
reviews.reviewText: This mattress frame is solid and easy to assemble. It is simple in appearance and serves our guest bedroom well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and easy.
reviews.reviewText: Cheap, easy to put together, sturdy. Only downsides were the instructions became miss-labeled half way through (but it's simple so there wasn't any problems for me) and the double sided sticky tape really only works once. I got a bed skirt later and when i lifted the mattress, the tape came with and got tangled together making it useless. Would recommend to put down a skirt or box spring first; if you don't have or won't use just leave the paper on the tape since it'll just come off anyways when changing your sheets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great bed frame!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. to start off this was super easy to put together. it comes with long screws and short screws, and a little screw thingy to screw them in (the twisty one). it’s really nice didn’t take long for me to put together at all and it’s super cosy. it also had space for me to put my headboard on it aswell. afordable and super cute! 10/10
Vale la pena la compra, es fácil de armar. Diseño simple.

Love this frame. Getting rid of my box spring was a game changer. I thought it was my old frame that was squeaking, but turned out to be my box spring. I was worried no box spring would mean the bed would be quite low, but this is higher than my old frame+box spring+mattress. Really enjoy the height of this frame. It's been nice and sturdy, no squeaking sounds, the frame isn't moving around from getting in/out. Surprised on the quality for this price, the easy assembly. I really enjoyed the allen wrench/socket tool they included, which made assembling this an absolute pleasure (seriously, I really enjoyed ratcheting that thing).
Fácil de armar, ligero, estable, sin ruido. Considerar que si el colchón es alto, queda muy alta la cama. Hecho para contar con cabecera ya que sí no, queda grande. Me encantó!
Es la mejor base,muy barata,se arma muy fácil y lo mejor es que te viene incluidas las herramientas con las que la armarás,es muy ligera así que es fácil mover la cama de lugar y es muy resistente
Excelente producto, súper funcional y se arma en menos de 15bminutos siguiente las instrucciones. Viene con herramienta para su armado por lo que, no necesitarás nada más
